Variables
apiServer
const apiServer

URL to API server as string

Functions
SelectItem
export default function SelectItem(
props
)

Generates page for customer to select an item on.

Parameters
props

An object with at least an item property which has a category property that contains an array of object that each have menu_item_info_id and name properties. The object must also contain a name property that contains an array the first item of which is an object with a name property.

Returns

<div> tag containing page

imageURL
function imageUrl(
item
)

Produces URL to an image of the item.

Parameters
item

Object containing at least a menu_item_info_id property with the ID number of the item

Returns

URL to item image as string

getServerSideProps
export async function getServerSideProps(
context
)

Gets the name of the category and the items in it from the API server.

Parameters
context

the state of the browser session that the app is running in

Returns

Object with items and name properties that are an array of item objects and the name of the category respectively
